## How to Participate:

1.  **Create an iNaturalist account (if you do not have one already)**
2.  **Record photos or audio of wild organisms in Marquette County during the observation period (April 25-28th)**
3.  **Upload to iNaturalist via the app or website Repeat steps 2-3 (and attend group observation events!\*)**
